description:
Sega Genesis/Mega Drive and Master System/Mark III emulator based on Genesis Plus. Features very accurate emulation and is the first for WebOS. Runs well on a stock Pre with auto-frameskip. Performance varies by game and is similar to my free SNES app so Pixi users should use that as a reference. Install the "Remove Tap Locator" patch from Preware to improve performance when using touch controls. NOTE: The user must supply their own game ROMs and transfer them to the device's internal storage for use with this app.

Other features include:
* Very accurate sound emulation with high quality re-sampling
* SegaCD emulation (beta)
* 6-button controller support
* Backup memory and save state support, auto-save and ten manual slots for save states. (NOTE: write access to /media/internal is required, some versions of WebOS 1.4.5 are broken and need to be re-installed via WebOS Doctor)
* Supports ROM-based games in .bin and .smd formats, optionally in .zip files
* Configurable on-screen multi-touch controls & keyboard support
* iCade support (WebOS 2.0 or later)
* Portrait/Landscape orientation support

Follow me on Twitter for updates about my apps:
https://twitter.com/rakashazi

Visit the homepage at explusalpha.com for more info, ports for other platforms, and my other apps.
